title: U-SU Graffix
description: The U-SU Graffix Department is responsible for promoting events and programs coordinated by the U-SU Programming Units through print materials and the U-SU website. We establish and maintain an identity for the U-SU through consistent publicity campaigns and promotions.

title: About The U-SU
description: Mission: With open doors and minds, we provide space and opportunities, enabling Golden Eagles to soar. Vision: To become Cal State LA's hub for connection and growth.

title: Contact Us
description: University-Student Union, 5154 State University Dr, Los Angeles CA, 90032

title: Services
description: The programs and services hosted by the University-Student Union are funded by the student union fee and are available to all students free of charge.

title: Staff
description: Meet the staff of the U-SU.

title: Tenants
description: Our services and facilities departments provide convenience and easy availability for on-the-go students.
tags: college of professional and global education

title: Departments
description: Visit the departments of the U-SU: CCC, CSI, Graffix, Operations, and Recreation.

title: Cross Cultural Centers
description: With a commitment to increasing cross-cultural awareness, we offer a wide variety of programs and services that explore both the shared and unique experiences, histories, and heritages of our diverse community.

title: Asian Pacific Islander Resource Center
description: The APISRC provides services and support for students who identity as, or are interested in, Asian American, Pacific Islander, and South Asian/Desi community cultural issues.

title: Chicana/o Latina/o Student Resource Center
description: The CLSRC provides services and support for students who identify as, or are interested in, Chicana/o and/or Latina/o community and cultural issues. The CLSRC also develops long and short term programs and events focusing on issues of importance to the Chicana/o Latina/o community.

title: Cultural Graduation
description: These ceremonies and celebrations are great opportunities to acknowledge your academic achievements, honor your families, communities, and other significant people in your lives, and to celebrate the cultural influences that have contributed to your academic success.

title: Gender and Sexuality Resource Center
description: The Gender and Sexuality Resource Center at Cal State LA is dedicated to creating safe and respectful learning spaces, catering specifically to the empowerment of all individuals across the gender and sexuality spectrum.

title: Distinguished Women's Awards
description: This event honors women from Cal State LA for their many outstanding achievements and contributions to the community.

title: Pan African Student Resource Center
description: The PASRC provides services and support for students who identify as, or are interested in, Pan African community and cultural issues. The PASRC also develops long and short term programs and events focusing on issues of importance to the Pan African community.

title: Center for Student Involvement
description: The Center for Student Involvement empowers Golden Eagles to engage in transformative opportunities, build community, and create positive change.

title: Center for Student Involvement Forms
description: Forms that pertain to the Center for Student Involvement.

title: Fraternity and Sorority Life
description: We have over 25 fraternities and sororities on campus from which students experience relationships, community service, leadership development, networking, and personal growth.

title: Golden Eagle Event Krew (GEEK)
description: Golden Eagle Event Krew (GEEK) is an opportunity for Cal State LA students to get involved behind the scenes, helping with event programming and/or marketing for Center for Student Involvement events.

title: Recognized Student Organizations
description: Cal State LA is home to over 120 recognized student organizations that host events and meetings to engage students in community building, entertainment, and professional development.

title: Graffix ACUI Awards
description: Steal This Idea is the ACUI's marketing and graphics competition to recognize the year's best promotional ideas throughout the regions and presents them at the conference. The winning entries are selected based on concept, design, editorial content, and effectiveness.

title: Operations and Reservations
description: The Operations and Reservations Team consists of five divisions: building maintenance, building services, custodial services, media services, and union meeting and event services.

title: Meeting Rooms
description: Rent out a meeting space at CSULA U-SU. Current locations available to book are Los Angeles A/B/C (ABC), Theater, Alhambra, San Gabriel, U-SU Plaza rooms.

title: Recreation
description: Recreation is comprised of the Recreation Fitness Center Center and Recreation Esports. The Recreation Fitness Center is located on the basement level of the U-SU, and will be open to all students, staff and faculty.

title: Golden Eagle Nutrition Education (GENE)
description: Welcome to the Golden Eagle Nutrition Education (GENE) program! Here, you can sign up for personalized nutrition education sessions provided by our Cal State LA Nutritional Science students.

title: Governance
description: The University-Student Union's Board of Directors is the governing board of the Union. The purpose of the Board is to establish policy for the Union as a student body center for the benefit of students, faculty, staff and alumni at Cal State Los Angeles.

title: How to Vote
description: The University-Student Union's Board of Directors is the governing board of the Union. The purpose of the Board is to establish policy for the Union as a student body center for the benefit of students, faculty, staff and alumni at Cal State Los Angeles.

title: Meet the Board
description: The University-Student Union's Board of Directors is the governing board of the Union. The purpose of the Board is to establish policy for the Union as a student body center for the benefit of students, faculty, staff and alumni at Cal State Los Angeles.

title: Public Documents
description: As a tax-exempt organization, the University-Student Union (U-SU) must make the appropriate organizational documents available for inspection online or for copying at the organization's main office during normal business hours.

title: Public Document Archives
description: As a tax-exempt organization, the University-Student Union (U-SU) must make the appropriate organizational documents available for inspection online or for copying at the organization's main office during normal business hours.

title: Student Leader Elections
description: The University-Student Union's Board of Directors is the governing board of the Union. The purpose of the Board is to establish policy for the Union as a student body center for the benefit of students, faculty, staff and alumni at Cal State Los Angeles.

title: Events
description: The University-Student Union hosts various events throughout the school year. Make sure to check back here to stay up to date with the latest events.

title: Employment
description: Apply here for full-time or student assistant positions.
